name: Stock: A Tale from The Pages
name_original: Stock: A Tale from The Pages
description:
Take a long walk in the woods, hydrate slowly, and respect nature.

Stock was made for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper. It features three endings, achievements, a 1/100 chance of a secret encounter, and an even smaller chance for another secret encounter! It also features custom artwork and music pieces. 

This game utilizes the UI bar in Twine.

After the Dare's Play & Rate period, the game will receive an update to include more art pieces (unrelated: ignore broken image links). 

Content Warnings: 

Choking, drowning, fire, looping, blood, nails in feet
